entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:29 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 12:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 3.8°C
Pressure: 99.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: SW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Snow and local blowing snow beginning late this evening. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 16 with temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 16 with temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
